FuncDef:
The release-agent command enables the system to send DHCPv4 Release messages.
The undo release-agent command disables the function.
By default, the system is enabled to send DHCPv4 Release messages.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the device detects through ARP that a user is not online, it automatically sends the DHCPv4 Release message to the DHCPv4 server.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
